project_id.description: The GCP project ID for the project containing the target BigQuery dataset.
project_id.title: Project ID

dataset_id.description: The BigQuery dataset id that will house replicated tables.
dataset_id.title: Dataset ID

credentials_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key. Check out the docs if you need help generating this key.
credentials_json.title: Credentials JSON

basic_normalization.description: Whether or not to normalize the data in the destination. See basic normalization for more details.
basic_normalization.title: Basic Normalization
